name: Bounzy Ball: Bricks and Balls
description:
Balls vs Blocks: the most addictive and fun of mini brick breaker (arkanoid) game. It mixes between brick breaker and bubble shooter games, it is the perfect time killer!

Tap to shoot Ball to break the bricks (blocks).
When ball hits the brick, durability is reduced. When durability reduce to 0, brick breaks.
Get the Ball to increase the number of balls
When the bricks reach the bottom line, game is over!
The angle is key point! Try to make an endless ball chain!
Collect more power-up items to boost your shoot & coins to buy great balls

Game features:
◉ x2 Item: Double your balls in 15 seconds aiming time
◉ Full Trajectory Item: show full trajectory of your aiming in 15 seconds
◉ Easy and fun to play
◉ Colorful UI, fun sound effects
◉ Support fast forward & next level feature
◉ Can continue play if your game is over
◉ More balls with special features: add aiming length, add ball speed...
◉ Challenge your friends with Game Center support
◉ Small game size, save battery when playing
